item.description:
Photographing wildlife and nature subjects is one of the most exciting and challenging types of photography you can attempt. The combination of tough lighting conditions and reluctant subjects makes this type of image making a true challenge to do well.

Because of the level of challenge it also is one of the most rewarding photographic pursuits.!

This workshop will go over the methods and techniques to help you make great WILDLIFE & NATURE PHOTOGRAPHS. Topics covered will include:

Equipment selection
Locating wildlife subjects
Working with natural light
Shooting techniques
Tips and Tricks

If you like spending your days outside or have always admired great wildlife images this class is for you. Learn about how to capture this tough subject, and make great images.
item.name: WILDLIFE & NATURE PHOTOGRAPHY workshop
